effect.x_y: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

short_effect.x_y: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

flavor_text.x_y: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
